name: LZero
description:
WHAT'S LZERO?



LZero is the one-stop shop for all your group travel needs, services only made possible with web3!



Travelling soon? Choose from our endless peer-to-peer services and events. Organize, book and split payment directly on our platform; no more back and forth, no more frustration!



Running your own business? List your services on LZero, on your own terms, with reduced platform fees!



WHY LZERO?



‚ÄúLet‚Äôs meet at ETH NYC!‚Äù says @DoodlingApes69420, your twitter BFF you‚Äôve never met, but would stand in front of a bus for.

‚ÄúYeah! We can all share a flat!‚Äù, chimes in @ETHto100k.



How exciting?! Your head is already filled with ideas of all the degen frens you‚Äôre gonna meet, all the parties you‚Äôre gonna attend, all the fun you‚Äôre gonna have!



‚ÄúSure, let‚Äôs organize this!!‚Äù, you reply as you excitingly look up tickets prices for the event.

...

Spoiler alert:

You didn‚Äôt organize this.

Next thing you know, it‚Äôs already June and you‚Äôre laying on your couch, scrolling through your TL, reading tweet after tweet about the best NFT after-party you‚Äôve heard of in your life.



FOMO takes over ‚Äî ‚ÄúWhy didn‚Äôt I book it?‚Äù



Well Chad, let us tell you why you didn‚Äôt book it.

Simply imagining having to browse 11 different websites to book tickets, accommodations, activities and events, coordinate all of them into a 4-day trip, send all available options to @DoodlingApes69420 and @ETHto100k, going back and forth, calculating all costs for each of you, and risk booking the trip without any guarantee that they‚Äôll pay you back, or best case scenario, that you‚Äôll have to beg them again and again to ‚Äúsend ETH‚Äù until they actually end up connecting their ledger in October 2027? ...

Can the devs do something? üò≠



Well, ‚Äî say no more fam



Introducing LZero, your new go-to web3, P2P service providing platform!



Not only can you now find and book events, activities, accommodations and singles in your area all-in-one place, but group travel organization has been made easier thanks to our integrated Split&Pay system!



LOCATION BASED
Travelling to a new city? Find worthwhile events, accommodations and activities for your dates.



BOOK EVENTS, ACTIVITIES, ACCOMMODATIONS, ...
Don‚Äôt know what to do during your free time? Get recommended activities and events in the area during your stay.



And if you don‚Äôt want to sleep in the streets, you can book your accommodation directly on LZero ‚Äî with less fees!







ORGANIZE TOGETHER
No more sharing 1000 links into the convo that no one checks out! Create a trip list with your friends and bookmark interesting listings, together!



SPLIT & PAY
Your group vacation is all planned? It‚Äôs time to book! Simply enter your wallet addresses, and each participant will pay their own due!



No more going back and forth between your calculator app and your venmo, no more headaches of who owes what, no more begging for your $17,43 back!



LIST YOUR EVENTS AND SERVICES
Want to make additional income by providing your own peer-to-peer services? From organizing events, to renting out our place, to selling homemade lemonade, simply upload the services you wish to provide onto the platform!



The best part? We will keep our fees significantly lower than web2 centralized platforms, aiming for <10% on Ethereum and even less on layer 2s.
